name: react-island-runtime
description: SSR-first React islands runtime and server helpers

scripts.dev:server: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch src --ext js,jsx --exec "node --loader @esbuild-kit/esm-loader src/server/index.js"
scripts.dev:contentstack-demo: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch examples/contentstack-demo --watch src --ext js,jsx --exec "node --loader @esbuild-kit/esm-loader examples/contentstack-demo/server/index.js"
scripts.dev:commercetools-demo: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch examples/commercetools-demo --watch src --ext js,jsx --exec "node --loader @esbuild-kit/esm-loader examples/commercetools-demo/server/index.js"
scripts.dev:agility-demo: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch examples/agility-demo --watch src --ext js,jsx --exec "node --loader @esbuild-kit/esm-loader examples/agility-demo/server/index.js"
scripts.dev:contentstack-commercetools-demo: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch examples/contentstack-commercetools-demo --watch src --ext js,jsx --exec "node --loader @esbuild-kit/esm-loader examples/contentstack-commercetools-demo/server/index.js"
scripts.dev:commercetools: yarn kill:commercetools && cross-env DEMO_TARGET=commercetools node scripts/dev-run.mjs
scripts.dev:contentstack: yarn kill:contentstack && cross-env DEMO_TARGET=contentstack node scripts/dev-run.mjs
scripts.dev:agility: yarn kill:agility && cross-env DEMO_TARGET=agility node scripts/dev-run.mjs
scripts.dev:contentstack-commercetools: yarn kill:contentstack-commercetools && cross-env DEMO_TARGET=contentstack-commercetools node scripts/dev-run.mjs
